title: Google play films wrong language
content:
Hi guys,
So I'm a Belgian citizen currently living in Spain. The problem I have is my Google account has been created when I was in Spain and so all my services like movies etc are entirely in Spanish.

I would like to get to my home country store so I can buy original version movies with matching subtitles.

I've read somewhere that I can "change" my country but when I go and check this option, I have no option to change anything it just stay grey.

Any help would be greatly appreciated
